meanings.definition: A demon in female form that seduces men in their sleep.
meanings.sent1: The succubus appeared in his dreams, tempting him with her beauty.
meanings.sent2: Legends tell of a succubus who lures men into her trap while they sleep.
meanings.sent3: The succubus tried to seduce the man, but he woke up and realized it was just a dream.
meanings.sent4: Her alluring presence in his dreams made him wonder if the succubus was real.
meanings.sent5: The image of the succubus haunted his thoughts, making him afraid to sleep.

meanings.definition: A female demon believed to have sexual intercourse with sleeping men.
meanings.sent1: The villagers feared the succubus would visit them at night and steal their dreams.
meanings.sent2: In folklore, the succubus is said to drain the life force of men while they slumber.
meanings.sent3: The succubus's reputation as a seductress made her the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a succubus preying on unsuspecting men was both terrifying and intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the succubus spread throughout the land, causing fear and fascination.
